name: Spectral Hunt
description:
There are many locations tainted by spectrals across the lands. You have been requested by the church to seek out these tainted locations and cleanse them. You must hunt down these spectrals that have manifested and corrupted these lands. 

To progress through the locations you must hunt down the spectrals and destroy them with your attacks, pick up the ingredients they drop, locate the scroll, and make your way to the campfire.

Movement
W - Up
A - Left
S - Down
D - Right

Attacks
E - Sigils appear and burn any spectral directly to your left, right, above, or below you.

R - Protection spell that engulfs you, eradicating any spectral that touches you.

Menu
W,A,S,D - Movement
- Select
